name: Coloured
description:
You have the power to control the environment. You have to change the colors of the environment in order to solve the puzzles and complete the levels.

Submission for Mini Jam

This game is my submission to the #minijam101. I had so much fun making it and i hope you will have too playing it!

How To Play

Press "J" to change the environment color to blue and "K" to change the environment color to red. But the player's color will be opposite of the environment. More explained in the game itself!
